parallel.distributed

Class BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverIntf

    public class BCastSrv2DAccumulatorBridge
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverIntf
    small bridge program that connects to a BCastSrv server as another client, as well as to a DAccumulatorSrv for getting its notifications, and submitting them to the broadcast server.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2016

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou

      • notifyChange

        public void notifyChange(SubjectIntf subject)
        gets a value and submits it to the BCastSrv. This is a call-back method executed from the DAccumulatorClt.AsynchUpdateThread.notifyObservers() which is called whenever a new incumbent is sent to the DAccumulatorSrv. It is made public because it's an interface method.
        Specified by:
        notifyChange in interface ObserverIntf
        Parameters:
        subject -
